title: Fashion daze : Australian style on the catwalk 1910s-1970s
creator_credit: National Film and Sound Archive of Australia
brief_description: Fashion daze is a glimpse of Australian womens’ fashion and style from the early 1910s to the 1970s. Focusing on fashion parades of lingerie, day wear, hats, leisure wear, evening wear and bridal gowns, styles from each decade are presented. Narrated by Lyn Mills.
